subject: Football
Officiating (Sports)
Lockouts
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: Negotiations between the N.F.L. and its locked-out officials broke off Saturday morning, all but ensuring that replacement referees would work at least the first week of the regular season.
snippet: Negotiations between the N.F.L. and its locked-out officials broke off Saturday morning, all but ensuring that replacement referees would work at least the first week of the regular season.
